description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Chinese Checkers, the classic game you know and love, plus extra game modes that add a whole new dimension to the game.  Cast cool combos on your opponent in the new innovative Combo mode.  Puzzle mode adds 40 levels and hours of puzzle solving.  Go against the clock in Time Attack mode, with each level increasing in difficulty.  4 game modes in all, and fun for the whole family!
description.short: Chinese Checkers, the classic game you know and love, plus extra game modes that add a whole new dimension to the game.  Cast cool combos on your opponent in the new innovative Combo mode.  Puzzle mode adds 40 levels and hours of puzzle solving.  Go against the clock in Time Attack mode, with each level increasing in difficulty.  4 game modes in all, and fun for the whole family!
